title: Perma Banned
body: Is there anyway to get your account unbanned if it is perma banned. I got banned for being toxic.

replies.body: Sorry, but a permanent ban is permanent. The only time that you will be unbanned is if you are banned in error.
No way dude. You mean to tell me permanent means forever?! Mind blown.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
You'd think OP would get that by the Perma part of perma ban.

Well to be fair, "permaban" is frequently interchanged with "indefinite ban" and nobody really mentions the distinction (such as a lock for account compromise or chargeback), and some permbans are errors. Though they are outliers, because of that I don't bother bringing up the definition of "permanent".
I was mainly referencing the fact that OP said he was perma'd for toxicity.

your account is gone.  its not that big a deal.  just make a new account.  i find the leveling process more fun than the game at level 30 anyway.  i just make new accounts level them up and move on to the next one.

i have 5 accounts at level 30 now and i rarely play them.  im working on like 10 low level ones
i meant to ask u but u should give me one of your accounts im trying to reform
this is my third account i was banned for scripting on one and being toxic on the other two . i dont feel like making a 4th account . u should give me one of urs lol
Nope. When you're perma'd you deserved it. Reform and make a new account if you're not IP'd.
